componentDescription: A versatile component for structured navigation, displaying a list of interactive items and their sub-menus.

items.typeValues: An array of objects conforming to the MenubarItem interface.
items.description: An array of `MenubarItem` objects, representing the list of items to be displayed in the menubar.

orientation.description: Specifies the visual orientation of the menubar, either horizontal or vertical.

size.description: Defines the predefined size variant for the menubar, such as 'small', 'medium', or 'large'.

variant.description: Determines the visual style or theme variant of the menubar.

defaultActiveMenuId.description: The ID of the menu that should be active by default.

defaultOpenMenuId.description: The ID of the menu that should be open by default.

views.description: Optional custom styling properties for various sub-components of the Menubar.
